A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi Isn't exactly like the other movies in the franchise... moving away from the purists idea of what a Star Wars movie must be\, and towards a direction of what it will become. If this franchise was going to stay relevant\, the writing was going to adapt to a new generation. Was it the best written movie in the series\, no. was it episode 1\, 2 or 3... no. Don't read all the reviews that trash the movie. Star Wars will always be at minimum entertaining and an escape.
